00028 #include <complex.h>

00039 static void tb_pot(Interaction* P,
00040                    const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00041                    const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00042                    const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00043                    complex double v[])
00044 {       
00045   int TT, tautau;
00046 
00047   TT = X13->T * X24->T;
00048   tautau = ((1-G1->xi*G3->xi)*(1-G2->xi*G4->xi))/4+(G1->xi*G4->xi+G2->xi*G3->xi)/2; 
00049 
00050   if (!TT && !tautau) return;
00051 
00052   complex double SS, RR;
00053   complex double lambda, alpha, psi;
00054   complex double rho[3], rho2, pi[3], pi2, sigsig;
00055   complex double rhoxpi[3], S[3];
00056   complex double L2, LS, S12, beta, theta, rhopi;
00057   complex double S12pipi, S12ll, S12rhopi;
00058   
00059   int i;
00060   
00061   SS = X13->S * X24->S; RR = X13->R * X24->R;
00062   lambda = X13->lambda + X24->lambda;
00063   alpha = X13->alpha + X24->alpha;
00064 
00065   for (i=0; i<3; i++) rho[i] = X13->rho[i] - X24->rho[i];
00066   rho2 = cvec3sqr(rho);
00067   for (i=0; i<3; i++) pi[i] = 0.5*(X13->pi[i] - X24->pi[i]);
00068 
00069   sigsig = cvec3mult(X13->sig, X24->sig);
00070 
00071   if (P->l2 || P->spinorbit || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->l2tpp){
00072     cvec3cross(rho, pi, rhoxpi);
00073     L2 = cvec3sqr(rhoxpi);
00074   }
00075   
00076   if (P->spinorbit || P->l2ls) {
00077     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00078       S[i] = 0.5*(X13->sig[i]*X24->S+X13->S*X24->sig[i]);
00079     LS = cvec3mult(rhoxpi, S);
00080   }
00081 
00082   if (P->momentump2 || P->momentumpr2 || P->l2 || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) {
00083     beta = I*((conj(G1->a) - G3->a)*X13->lambda + (conj(G2->a) - G4->a)*X24->lambda);
00084     theta = (conj(G1->a)*X13->lambda + conj(G2->a)*X24->lambda)*
00085             (G3->a*X13->lambda + G4->a*X24->lambda);
00086     psi = theta - alpha*lambda;     
00087     pi2 = cvec3sqr(pi);
00088     rhopi = cvec3mult(rho, pi);
00089   }
00090 
00091   if (P->tensor || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp)
00092     S12 = 3*cvec3mult(X13->sig, rho)*cvec3mult(X24->sig, rho) - sigsig*rho2;
00093 
00094   if (P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp) {
00095     S12rhopi = 1.5*(cvec3mult(X13->sig, rho)*cvec3mult(X24->sig, pi) + cvec3mult(X13->sig, pi)*cvec3mult(X24->sig, rho))
00096                   - sigsig * rhopi;
00097     S12pipi = 3*cvec3mult(X13->sig, pi)*cvec3mult(X24->sig, pi) - sigsig*pi2;
00098   }
00099 
00100   if (P->tll || P->tpp || P->l2tpp) {
00101     S12ll = 3*cvec3mult(X13->sig, rhoxpi)*cvec3mult(X24->sig, rhoxpi) - sigsig*L2;
00102   }
00103 
00104   InteractionType type;
00105   double gamma, kappa;
00106   int ilabel;
00107   complex double iakapi, kapakapi, thelakapi;
00108   complex double Gi, PiPi, PiPiG, PirPir;
00109   complex double LL, L2LS, TLL;
00110   complex double TPP, TRP, L2TPP;
00111   
00112   complex double l2tpppipi, l2tpprhopi, l2tpprr, l2tppll;
00113   
00114   int pipidone=0, pipigdone=0, pirpirdone=0;
00115   int l2done=0, l2lsdone=0;
00116   int tlldone=0, tppdone=0;
00117   int trpdone=0, l2tppdone=0;
00118   int idx;
00119 
00120   for (idx=0; idx<P->ncomponents; idx++) {
00121 
00122     type = P->c[idx].type;
00123     gamma = P->c[idx].gamma;
00124     kappa = P->c[idx].kappa;
00125     ilabel = P->c[idx].ilabel;
00126     
00127     if ((idx==0 || kappa != P->c[idx-1].kappa) && type != VC) {
00128       iakapi = 1/(alpha+kappa);
00129       kapakapi = kappa*iakapi;
00130       if (P->l2 || P->l2ls || P->tll || P->tpp || P->prtrp || P->l2tpp)
00131         thelakapi = theta*iakapi + lambda*kapakapi;
00132         
00133       Gi = cpow32(kapakapi)*cexp(-0.5*rho2*iakapi);
00134       pipidone = 0;
00135       pipigdone = 0;
00136       pirpirdone = 0;
00137       l2done = 0;
00138       l2lsdone = 0;
00139       tlldone = 0;
00140       tppdone = 0;
00141       l2tppdone = 0;
00142       trpdone = 0;
00143     }
00144 
00145 
00146     // Calculation of non-overlap and non-Gaussian parts of the matrix elements
00147  
00148     // p2V
00149     if (!pipidone && p2V <= type && type <= tsp2V) {
00150       PiPi = pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+
00151         0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2+
00152         0.75*(lambda-theta*iakapi);
00153 
00154       pipidone = 1;
00155     }
00156 
00157     // Vp2
00158     if (!pipigdone && Vp2 <= type && type <= tsVp2) {
00159       PiPiG = pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+
00160         (0.25*theta-0.5)*csqr(iakapi)*rho2+
00161         0.75*lambda-(0.75*theta-1.5)*iakapi;
00162 
00163       pipigdone = 1;
00164     }
00165         
00166     // pr2V
00167     if (!pirpirdone && pr2V <= type && type <= tspr2V) {
00168       PirPir = csqr(kapakapi)*(csqr(rhopi)-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi*rho2+
00169                                0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*csqr(rho2))+
00170                alpha*kapakapi*(pi2-0.5*beta*iakapi*rhopi+
00171                                0.25*theta*csqr(iakapi)*rho2) -
00172                2*csqr(kapakapi)*(-beta*rhopi+theta*iakapi*rho2) +
00173                0.25*(csqr(kapakapi)*rho2+3*alpha*kapakapi)*(lambda-theta*iakapi) +
00174                3*csqr(kapakapi)*theta;
00175 
00176       pirpirdone = 1;
00177     }
00178 
00179     // Vl2
00180     if (!l2done && Vl2 <= type && type <= tsVl2) {
00181           LL = kapakapi*(kapakapi*L2 + 2*alpha*pi2 - beta*rhopi + 0.5*thelakapi*rho2
00182              - 1.5*psi);
00183       
00184       l2done = 1;
00185     }
00186 
00187 
00188     // Vl2ls
00189     if (!l2lsdone && (type == Vl2ls || type == tVl2ls)) {
00190       L2LS = LS*csqr(kapakapi)*(kapakapi*L2 + 4*alpha*pi2 - 2*beta*rhopi + thelakapi*rho2
00191                     - 5*psi) + 2*LS*kapakapi;
00192       
00193       l2lsdone = 1;
00194     } 
00195 
00196     // VTll - S12(l,l)
00197     if (!tlldone && (type == VTll || type == tVTll)) {
00198       TLL = csqr(kapakapi)*S12ll - alpha*kapakapi*S12pipi
00199             - 0.25*kapakapi*thelakapi*S12
00200             + 0.5*kapakapi*beta*S12rhopi;
00201 
00202       tlldone = 1;
00203     }
00204     
00205     // VTpp - S12(p,p)
00206     if (!tppdone && (type == VTpp || type == tVTpp)) {
00207       TPP = csqr(kapakapi)*(kapakapi*S12ll*(5*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)
00208                             + S12pipi*(9*csqr(alpha) + 13*alpha*kapakapi*rho2 + 2*csqr(kapakapi*rho2))
00209                             - S12rhopi*(4.5*alpha*beta + 16*alpha*kapakapi*rhopi + 2.5*beta*kapakapi*rho2
00210                                         + 4*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi*rho2)
00211                             + S12*(5.25*kapakapi*psi + 2.25*theta - 4.5
00212                                    + 2*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi) + 4*kapakapi*beta*rhopi
00213                                    - 0.75*kapakapi*thelakapi*rho2));
00214       tppdone = 1;
00215     }
00216     
00217     // NOTE: 06/08/03 Added factor 0.5 which was implied by hermitizing the super operator basis ...
00218     // prVTrp (p_r v(r) +v(r) p_r) S12(r,p)
00219     if (!trpdone && (type == prVTrp || type == tprVTrp)) {
00220       TRP = 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*(S12pipi*2*alpha*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)
00221                             + S12*(1.5*theta - 2.625*kapakapi*csqr(beta) - 3
00222                                    + 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*rho2*rhopi
00223                                    - 2*kapakapi*(alpha*pi2 + kapakapi*csqr(rhopi))
00224                                    - 0.5*kapakapi*beta*(1 + 9*kapakapi)*rhopi
00225                                    + 0.375*kapakapi*iakapi*csqr(beta)*rho2)
00226                             + S12rhopi*(-1.5*alpha*beta*(2 - 7*kapakapi)
00227                                    - 0.5*csqr(kapakapi)*beta*iakapi*csqr(rho2)
00228                                    + 2*kapakapi*(3*alpha + kapakapi*rho2)*rhopi
00229                                    - 0.5*kapakapi*beta*(5 - 12*kapakapi)*rho2));
00230       trpdone = 1;
00231     }
00232 
00233     // Vl2Tpp - {L2 S12(p,p)}_H
00234     if (!l2tppdone && (type == Vl2Tpp || type == tVl2Tpp)) {
00235       l2tpppipi = 60*cpow(alpha, 3)*kapakapi*pi2 + 117*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2*rho2
00236                    - 33*csqr(alpha*kapakapi*rhopi) 
00237                    - 21*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*csqr(rhopi) 
00238                    + 33*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00239                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*L2*csqr(rho2)
00240                    + 3*cpow(kapakapi,3)*cpow(rho2,3)*thelakapi
00241                    - 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00242                    + 3*csqr(alpha)*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00243                    - 42*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rho2*rhopi
00244                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*rhopi
00245                    + alpha*kapakapi*(74 - 196.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*rho2
00246                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(16 + 21*theta - 52.5*kapakapi*psi)*csqr(rho2);
00247                    
00248       l2tpprhopi = 24*alpha*cpow(kapakapi*rhopi,3)
00249                    - 96*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00250                    - 48*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*rho2*pi2
00251                    - 4*cpow(kapakapi,4)*rho2*rhopi*L2
00252                    - 6*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)*rhopi
00253                    - 4.5*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*L2
00254                    + 12*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00255                    - 34.5*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*L2
00256                    + 30*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi*rhopi)
00257                    - 30*csqr(alpha)*beta*kapakapi*pi2
00258                    - 1.5*alpha*beta*(9 - 35*kapakapi*psi)
00259                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-138 + 60*theta + 201*kapakapi*psi)*rhopi
00260                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-68 + 87*kapakapi*psi + 12*theta)*rho2*rhopi
00261                    - 4.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)
00262                    + beta*kapakapi*(-17.5 - 7.5*theta + 48*kapakapi*psi)*rho2;
00263                    
00264       l2tppll = 42*csqr(alpha*kapakapi)*pi2 - 9*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*csqr(rhopi)
00265                    + 15*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*rho2 
00266                    + cpow(kapakapi,4)*rho2*L2
00267                    + 1.5*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*csqr(rho2)
00268                    - 3*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*rho2
00269                    - 21*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*rhopi
00270                    + alpha*kapakapi*(30 - 73.5*kapakapi*psi)
00271                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(6 - 24*kapakapi*psi + 10.5*theta)*rho2;
00272                    
00273       l2tpprr = 12*alpha*cpow(kapakapi,3)*pi2*csqr(rhopi)
00274                    + 2*cpow(kapakapi,4)*csqr(rhopi)*L2
00275                    + 3.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*rho2*csqr(rhopi)
00276                    - 0.75*cpow(kapakapi,3)*thelakapi*pi2*csqr(rho2)
00277                    - 0.75*csqr(kapakapi*thelakapi*rho2)
00278                    + 6*beta*cpow(kapakapi,3)*rhopi*(L2 - csqr(rhopi))
00279                    + 24*alpha*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*pi2*rhopi
00280                    + alpha*kapakapi*(-35 + 34.5*kapakapi*psi + 15*theta)*pi2
00281                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(78.5 - 41.25*kapakapi*psi - 56.25*theta)*csqr(rhopi)
00282                    + csqr(kapakapi)*(-14.5 + 12.75*kapakapi*psi + 5.25*theta)*pi2*rho2
00283                    + kapakapi*thelakapi*(-9.75 + 3.75*theta + 13.5*kapakapi*psi)*rho2
00284                    + 7.5*beta*csqr(kapakapi)*thelakapi*rho2*rhopi
00285                    + beta*kapakapi*(37 - 67.5*kapakapi*psi - 7.5*theta)*rhopi
00286                    - 13.5 + 6.75*theta - 47.25*csqr(kapakapi*psi)
00287                    + 5.25*kapakapi*(13 - 5*theta)*psi;
00288                    
00289       L2TPP = csqr(kapakapi)*(S12pipi*l2tpppipi + S12rhopi*l2tpprhopi + S12*l2tpprr + S12ll*l2tppll);
00290       
00291       l2tppdone = 1;
00292                     
00293     }
00294         
00295     // Central Potentials
00296     if (type == V && TT)
00297       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR*Gi;
00298     else if (type == sV && TT)
00299       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*Gi;
00300     else if (type == tV && tautau)
00301       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*Gi;
00302     else if (type == tsV && tautau)
00303       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*Gi;
00304 
00305     // p2V Potentials
00306     else if (type == p2V && TT)
00307       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR*PiPi*Gi;
00308     else if (type == sp2V && TT)
00309       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*PiPi*Gi;
00310     else if (type == tp2V && tautau)
00311       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*PiPi*Gi;
00312     else if (type == tsp2V && tautau)
00313       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*PiPi*Gi;
00314 
00315     // Vp2 Potentials
00316     else if (type == Vp2 && TT)
00317       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR*PiPiG*Gi;
00318     else if (type == sVp2 && TT)
00319       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*PiPiG*Gi;
00320     else if (type == tVp2 && tautau)
00321       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*PiPiG*Gi;
00322     else if (type == tsVp2 && tautau)
00323       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*PiPiG*Gi;
00324 
00325     // pr2 Potentials
00326     else if (type == pr2V && TT)
00327       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR*PirPir*Gi;
00328     else if (type == spr2V && TT)
00329       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*PirPir*Gi;
00330     else if (type == tpr2V && tautau)
00331       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*PirPir*Gi;
00332     else if (type == tspr2V && tautau)
00333       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*PirPir*Gi;
00334 
00335     // l2 Potentials
00336     else if (type == Vl2 && TT)
00337       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR*Gi*LL;
00338     else if (type == sVl2 && TT)
00339       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*sigsig*RR*Gi*LL;
00340     else if (type == tVl2 && tautau)
00341       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*SS*RR*Gi*LL;
00342     else if (type == tsVl2 && tautau)
00343       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*sigsig*RR*Gi*LL;
00344 
00345     // Spin-Orbit Potentials
00346     else if (type == Vls && TT)
00347       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*LS*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
00348     else if (type == tVls && tautau)
00349       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*LS*kapakapi*RR*Gi;
00350 
00351     // l2ls Potentials
00352     else if (type == Vl2ls && TT)
00353       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*L2LS;
00354     else if (type == tVl2ls && tautau)
00355       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*L2LS;
00356 
00357     // Tensor Potentials
00358     else if (type == VT && TT)
00359       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
00360     else if (type == tVT && tautau)
00361       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*S12*csqr(kapakapi)*RR*Gi;
00362 
00363     // S12(l,l) Potentials
00364     else if (type == VTll && TT)
00365       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TLL;
00366     else if (type == tVTll && tautau)
00367       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TLL;
00368 
00369     // S12(p,p) Potentials
00370     else if (type == VTpp && TT)
00371       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TPP;
00372     else if (type == tVTpp && tautau)
00373       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TPP;
00374 
00375     // {L2 S12(p,p)}_H Potentials
00376     else if (type == Vl2Tpp && TT)
00377       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*L2TPP;
00378     else if (type == tVl2Tpp && tautau)
00379       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*L2TPP;
00380     
00381     // (p_r v(r) + v(r) p_r) S12(r,p) 
00382     else if (type == prVTrp && TT)
00383       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*RR*Gi*TRP;
00384     else if (type == tprVTrp && tautau)
00385       v[ilabel] += gamma*tautau*RR*Gi*TRP;
00386     
00387     // Coulomb Potential
00388     else if (type == VC && TT && G1->xi == 1 && G2->xi == 1)
00389       v[ilabel] += gamma*TT*SS*RR/csqrt(2*alpha)*zcoulomb(0.5*rho2/alpha);
00390   }
00391 }

00393 
00394 void calcPotential(const Interaction *P,
00395                    const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, double v[])
00396 {
00397   int i;
00398   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_pot = {dim: P->n, opt: 0, par: P, me: tb_pot};
00399 
00400   calcSlaterDetTBME(Q, X, &op_tb_pot, v);
00401   
00402   v[0] = 0.0;
00403   for (i=1; i<P->n; i++)
00404     v[0] += v[i];
00405 }
00406 
00407 
00408 void calcPotentialrowcol(const Interaction* P,
00409                          const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X, double v[], 
00410                          int k, int l)
00411 {
00412   int i;
00413   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_pot = {dim: P->n, opt: 0, par: P, me: tb_pot};
00414 
00415   calcSlaterDetTBMErowcol(Q, X, &op_tb_pot, v, k, l);
00416   
00417   v[0] = 0.0;
00418   for (i=1; i<P->n; i++)
00419     v[0] += v[i];
00420 }

00423 void calcPotentialod(const Interaction *P,

00430

00432 
00433   v[0] = 0.0;
00434   for (i=1; i<P->n; i++)
00435     v[0] += v[i];

00446

00454 
00455 void calcPotentialsHF(const Interaction* Int,
00456                       const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00457                       void* mes)
00458 {
00459   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_pot = {dim: Int->n, opt: 0, par: Int, me: tb_pot};
00460   calcSlaterDetTBHFMEs(Q, X, &op_tb_pot, mes);
00461 
00462   int A=Q->A;
00463   complex double (*v)[Int->n] = mes;
00464   int k,m,i;
00465 
00466   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00467     for (k=0; k<A; k++) {
00468       v[k+m*A][0] = 0.0;
00469       for (i=1; i<Int->n; i++)
00470        v[k+m*A][0] += v[k+m*A][i];
00471     }
00472 }      
00473 
00474 
00475 void calcPotentialHF(const Interaction* Int,
00476                      const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00477                      complex double* vhf)
00478 {
00479   int A=Q->A;
00480   complex double v[A*A][Int->n];
00481
